text: Goniothalamus hookeri is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Goniothalamus hookeri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Goniothalamus hookeri
